thread.title: Coming soon: Settle PTPTN loans at airports before flying abroad
thread.title_full: Coming soon: Settle PTPTN loans at airports before flying abroad

title: Coming soon: Settle PTPTN loans at airports before flying abroad
text:
More 
National Higher Education Fund (PTPTN) loan defaulters who are on the immigration blacklist will soon be able to settle their loans at airports before they are allowed to travel abroad. 
This is among the facilities to be introduced by Malaysia Airports Holdings Bhd (MAHB) at KLIA2 to improve the queue management system. 
Blacklisted travellers are one of the reasons for the long queues at immigration checkpoints. 
For the rest of this story and more, subscribe for only RM150 a year. If you're already a subscriber, please sign in.
